/newJob.text: Kick off background work tailored to your needs. Select a Job type, configure its inputs, and submit—your request will be queued immediately and processed by our workers.

content: Choose Job Type: Pick from the available Jobs in the dropdown. Additional Job details can be found in the table below (including what parameters you need to provide the job).
Configure Parameters: A configuration panel appears with fields specific to the selected Job. Provide values for required inputs and adjust optional settings as needed.
Submit: Your job is created and enters PENDING status until a worker starts processing it.
When a worker begins processing, the status moves to STARTED.
After completion, the status becomes SUCCESS or FAILED. The result/output payload is stored with the job.
Validation errors will be highlighted in the form with guidance on how to fix them.
You can monitor progress anytime from the Jobs Monitoring Dashboard.

/jobs.text: Track every job from submission to completion. Filter, search, and drill into details without leaving the page.

content: A live table lists all jobs (new and historical).
Each row shows ID, Job Type, Status (PENDING / STARTED / SUCCESS / FAILED), Updated At, etc.
Select a Job: Click any row to open a pop-over with full details—inputs, parameters, timestamps, worker info (when available), and the complete result payload (including large JSON).
Filter & Search: Narrow by status, job type, or any visible field to find exactly what you need.
Auto-Refresh: The table updates periodically so you always see the latest status. You can also Refresh manually.
PENDING: Job is queued and waiting for a worker.
STARTED: A worker has picked up the job and is processing it.
SUCCESS / FAILED: Processing finished. The result payload is saved with the job for review.
Once your job has completed, you'll see the status update on the Jobs Monitoring Dashboard and can view the result, etc.
Completed jobs remain visible for 1 hour after finishing, then they are purged from the system.
